tours.title: The Rise of Rome
tours.description: Experience the grandeur of ancient Rome through the eyes of its most powerful leaders. Visit the magnificent Colosseum, Roman Forum, and Palatine Hill where emperors once ruled.

tours.title: Egyptian Pharaohs and Temples
tours.description: Discover the world of Cleopatra and ancient Egyptian civilization. From the mighty pyramids to the treasures of Tutankhamun, immerse yourself in the world of the pharaohs.
